description: Proxmox VE MCP Server - Tool Definitions

tools.name: get_nodes
tools.description: Get all nodes in the Proxmox cluster

tools.name: get_node_status
tools.description: Get detailed status information for a specific node including CPU, memory, and storage

node_name.description: Name of the node (e.g., pve1, pve2)

tools.name: get_cluster_resources
tools.description: Get all cluster resources including nodes, VMs, and containers

tools.name: get_storage
tools.description: Get all storage devices in the cluster with capacity and usage information

tools.name: get_node_storage
tools.description: Get storage devices accessible from a specific node

node_name.description: Name of the node (e.g., pve1, pve2)

tools.name: get_vms
tools.description: Get all virtual machines running on a specific node

node_name.description: Name of the node (e.g., pve1, pve2)

tools.name: get_vm_status
tools.description: Get detailed status of a specific virtual machine

node_name.description: Name of the node where VM is running

tools.name: start_vm
tools.description: Start a virtual machine that is currently stopped

node_name.description: Name of the node where VM is located

tools.name: stop_vm
tools.description: Stop a virtual machine immediately (hard stop)

node_name.description: Name of the node where VM is running

tools.name: shutdown_vm
tools.description: Gracefully shutdown a virtual machine (allows guest OS to shut down)

node_name.description: Name of the node where VM is running
Name of the node where VM is running

tools.name: get_containers
tools.description: Get all LXC containers running on a specific node

node_name.description: Name of the node (e.g., pve1, pve2)

tools.name: get_container_status
tools.description: Get detailed status of a specific LXC container

node_name.description: Name of the node where container is running

tools.name: start_container
tools.description: Start an LXC container that is currently stopped

node_name.description: Name of the node where container is located

tools.name: stop_container
tools.description: Stop an LXC container immediately (hard stop)

node_name.description: Name of the node where container is running

tools.name: shutdown_container
tools.description: Gracefully shutdown an LXC container (allows guest OS to shut down)

node_name.description: Name of the node where container is running
Name of the node where container is running

Virtual Machine Management.description: Tools for querying and controlling virtual machines
